attributes.action: Coronavirus testing for all those showing symptoms of the virus
attributes.additional_details: The coronavirus test should be made available to everyone to ensure people react accordingly and to  help in containing the virus.
attributes.background:
Clarification would help protect those most vulnerable to infection namely the elderly.

The government has a duty of care to help provide us with all relevant information that relates to our health and welfare.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301354

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
